title: Sudtipos releases Candy Script @Veer
content:
**[Candy Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014105513/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000254)**  
Download the [Candy Script PDF User Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014105513/http:/www.veer.com/download/pdf/candyscript.pdf) to have a complete preview of use of images, fun and words.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014105513im_/http:/typophile.com/files/candytypophi_3775.jpg)

Candy is a polaroid of where I live and love. I hope you like it.

Inspired by Argentina and its culture, Alejandro Paul’s Candy Script captures the country’s spirit. It comes from the tradition of window sign painting, but its thick hand-brushed characters - with alternates for almost every upper and lowercase letter - have a personality all their own. Tons of OpenType alternates included, over 600 characters in all. [Read more about Candy...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014105513/http:/www.veer.com/download/pdf/candyscript.pdf)

Best, [Sudtipos](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014105513/http:/www.sudtipos.com/)
author: Ale Paul
